title: Caffè Latte
details: Rich, full-bodied espresso in steamed milk, lightly topped with foam. A caffè latte is simply a shot or two of bold, tasty espresso with fresh, sweet steamed milk over it.

title: Cappuccino
details: Espresso with steamed milk, topped with a deep layer of foam.

title: Caffè Mocha
details: Espresso with bittersweet mocha sauce and steamed milk, topped with sweetened whipped cream. Delightful.

title: Caramel Macchiato
details: Espresso combined with vanilla-flavoured syrup, milk and caramel sauce over ice.

title: Vanilla Sweet Cream Cold Brew
details: Just before serving, our slow-steeped Cold Brew is topped with a delicate float of house-made vanilla sweet cream that cascades throughout the cup.

title: Mango Passion Frappuccino
details: A tropical mango and passionfruit infusion, perfectly blended with a fruity hibiscus tea and ice.

title: Raspberry Currant Frappuccino
details: Made with freshly brewed Teavana® tea, blended juice and ice.

title: Coffee Frappuccino
details: Starbucks® coffee is blended with nonfat milk and ice for a sip on the light side.

title: Mocha Frappuccino
details: Mocha sauce, Frappuccino® roast coffee, milk and ice all come together for a mocha flavor that'll leave you wanting more.
